div.div:
Parents/Guardians:
Be reminded that State of Oklahoma has compulsory attendance laws Title 70, section 10-105 that states: children between the ages of 5 and 18 must attend school.
Students are . . .

span.span: Provide a learning environment that respects the individual needs
of students and helps them to reach their full potential.

span.font: Haileyville School uses several sources to identify students with special needs. These sources include newspapers, websites, brochures, student handbooks (high school and elementary). We also use early childhood and kindergarten screening date sheets.
The District Homeless Liaison for Haileyville Public School is Mrs. Veronica Miller. For further information contact her at (918) 297-2626 Ext 1003

div.button:

Click for more Information

div.p: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT MONDAY... ...Visibility 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. ...In Oklahoma, Muskogee, McIntosh, Sequoyah, Pittsburg, Haskell, Latimer and Le Flore Counties. In Arkansas, Crawford, Franklin and Sebastian Counties. ...Until 10 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities are expected to be reduced to less than one quarter mile by the dense fog, creating hazardous driving conditions.
